name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in cloud infrastructure and automation solutions. Proficient in **AWS**, **GCP**, and implementing infrastructure as code using **Terraform**. Strong expertise in containerization and orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, coupled with CI/CD automation using **Jenkins**. Skilled in scripting with **Python** and **Bash**, I ensure robust deployment pipelines and efficient system integrations.

Demonstrated ability in managing cloud security and networking across Linux environments, while enhancing operational efficiency with monitoring tools like **Grafana** and **Prometheus**. My background includes building secure, compliant infrastructures aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I hold a solid foundation in automation using **Ansible** and **Packer**, ensuring reliable and repeatable deployments. With experience optimizing machine learning workflows, I integrate innovative solutions to support enterprise needs.
